metadata.title: mediawiki: information disclosure (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in mediawiki. The "rollback" feature (action=rollback) could be passed a specially crafted parameter that allowed an attacker to view the contents of arbitrary pages, regardless of whether they had permissions to do so. 
            STATEMENT: The mediawiki package was removed from OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) in version 4.3, therefore for OCP 4 has been marked as out of support scope.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
mediawiki is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
